Package uk.ac.glasgow.etparser.handlers

This package contains an EventHandler interface which should be implemented by all classes that interact with events; it also contains EventReport interface for providing statistics of the current state of the program; all classes that implement these two interfaces can also be found in this package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventHandler
    All classes which respond to events must implement this interface.
    EventReport
    All classes which produce a final report must implement that interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountCreation
    This class keeps track of all successfully created objects.
    CountDead
    This class keeps track of all dead objects tried to be accessed illegally.
    CountLegal
    This class keeps track of all live objects.
    CountMultipleCreations
    This class keeps track of all objects tried to be created more than once.
    CountNotBorn
    This class keeps track of all objects tried to be accessed before they were born.
    ErrorLogger
    A class to record all errors created by accesses to not born or dead objects or errors caused by trying to create an object more than once
    LiveSize  
    SampleMain  
    SimulatedHeap
    This class simulates the heap and keeps track of the object ids and the last event that happened to them as well as the total objects tried to be accessed ever.
    StatisticsLogger
    This class produces a file with statistics of the current state of the program and percentage of errors and successful creations.

Package uk.ac.glasgow.etparser.handlers Description

This package contains an EventHandler interface which should be implemented by all classes that interact with events; it also contains EventReport interface for providing statistics of the current state of the program; all classes that implement these two interfaces can also be found in this package.
